Systems Prof. Dr. Achim Streit Direktor upon request +49 721 608-25602 achim streit ∂does-not-exist.kit edu MS Teams-Chat ORCID Scientific Computing CenterHermann-von-Helmholtz-Platz 176344 Eggenstein-Leopoldshafen CV Publications Teaching Alumni Positions Further Activities Projects CV Since July 2010 Director of Scientific Computing Center (SCC), Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT), Germany and Professor for Distributed and Parallel High Performance Systems, Institute of Telematics, Department of Informatics, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT), Germany July 2005 – June 2010 Head of Distributed Systems and Grid Computing, Jülich Supercomputing Centre (JSC, formerly named ZAM), Forschungszentrum Jülich, Germany January 2005 – June 2005 Scientist, Central Institute for Applied Mathematics (ZAM), Forschungszentrum Jülich, Germany November 1999 – December 2004 Scientist, Paderborn Center for Parallel Computing (PC²), University of Paderborn, Germany November 1999 – December 2003 PhD in computer science, University of Paderborn, Germany Title of Thesis: Self-Tuning Job Scheduling Strategies for the Resource Management of HPC Systems and Computational Grids October 1994 – September 1999 Student of computer science (Diploma) in combination with electrical engineering, University of Dortmund, Germany My Google Scholar page and results from DBLP.
